items.title: “Amazon doesn’t help independent bookstores. Period.”
items.description: Amazon's lackluster response to scheduling its book sale around Independent Bookstore Day, Broadway is making big bucks, and more.

items.title: The Best Books to Give to Grads
items.description: Books are a great choice for a graduation gift. These titles offer both practical advice and inspiration to your recent grad.

items.description: Looking for a short story by your favorite YA author? This guide has you covered.

items.description: Climate activists are fighting to ensure we and the planet have a future. These books celebrate their crucial work.

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.
